title: Bela Tarr - Hotel Magnezit (1978) DVDRip
description:
The exam movie of BÃƒÂ©la Tarr.

Documentaristic subject picture about a worker's hostel. An old worker is suspected with stealing a motor, he's been fired from the factory and he has to leave the hostel. First he offends and attacks all of his roommates, then he starts to cry and tells that he was a pilot in WWII and he's left his soul there. An interesting portrait of human reactions and changing emotions.
